title: Is it me or is this year's Worlds looking actually really interesting?
body:
Aside from SKT being beastly, it actually looks like it will be a competitive pro scene... A lot of these games I am actually pretty excited to watch. Also RIP c9 vs SKT in their first group stage match xd.

Am I crazy? Or do a lot of the teams seem ready to throw down and they all have at least some prospects at taking on stronger teams?
